title: Lella Smith interview with Emma McRae
other_title: Lella Smith interview with Emma McCrae : Disney dreams come true
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
abstract: Lella Smith, curator of 'Dreams Come True' exhibition gives insight to the origins of the exhibition and some of Disney's best loved stories.
description: Lella Smith is the Creative Director of the Walt Disney Animation and Research Library and curator of the 'Dreams Come True: The Art of Disney's Classic Fairytales' exhibition. In this interview, Emma McRae, ACMI Exhibitions Curator, speaks to Lella about how the exhibition came about and the enormous task of selecting the films and items for exhibition from Disney’s vast archives.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002238; Dreams come true: interviews with Glen Keane and Lella Smith; Active; Nov 2010
